title: Ford Motor Co Unisex Youth Pull-Over Hoodie for Boys and Girls
features: UNISEX YOUTH HOODIE - RUNS SMALL: This style runs small, size up for a roomier fit. Our unisexÂ youth hooded sweatshirt looks stylish on both boys and girls and is great for easy, everyday wear.

SHRINK & FADE RESISTANT: Designed for daily wear, this relaxed fit tie-front pullover is the wardrobe staple they've been waiting for. Featuring ribbed cuffs and waistband, and a roomy front kangaroo pocket, our long sleeve medium weight graphic hoodie was constructed for comfort.
WASH & WEAR: Keep their new favorite hoodie looking better longer. Machine wash cold and tumble dry low to prolong the life of your garments.

Hand-printed in the USA using a dye sublimation process for amazing color and long lasting vibrancy.
GREAT FOR GIVING: The perfect gift for the active kiddos in your life, our high quality shirts are ideal for weekend wear, school days, or for just hanging around.
